verses.verse: Therefore <S%G3767><s%> I urge <S%G3870><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the mercies <S%G3628><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> to present <S%G3936><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> bodies <S%G4983><s%> a <S%G2378><s%> living <S%G2198><s%> sacrifice, <S%G2378><s%> holy, <S%G40><s%> acceptable <S%G2101><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> which is your <S%G5216><s%> spiritual <S%G3050><s%> service. <S%G2999><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Don't <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G4964><s%> conformed <S%G4964><s%> to <S%G165><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> but <S%G235><s%> be transformed <S%G3339><s%> by the renewing <S%G342><s%> of <S%G3563><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> mind, <S%G3563><s%> so that <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> may prove <S%G1381><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the <S%G2307><s%> good, <S%G18><s%> <S%G2532><s%> well-pleasing, <S%G2101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that was given <S%G1325><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> to every man <S%G3956><s%> who is <S%G5607><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to think <S%G5252><s%> of himself more highly <S%G5252><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> he ought <S%G1163><s%> to think; <S%G5426><s%> but <S%G235><s%> to think <S%G5426><s%> <S%G1519><s%> reasonably, <S%G4993><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has apportioned <S%G3307><s%> to each person <S%G1538><s%> a measure <S%G3358><s%> of faith. <S%G4102><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> even as <S%G2509><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the members <S%G3196><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G4234><s%> same <S%G846><s%> function, <S%G4234><s%>

so <S%G3779><s%> we, <S%G2070><s%> who are many, <S%G4183><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2596><s%> individually <S%G1520><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> one of another. <S%G240><s%>

Having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G1161><s%> gifts <S%G5486><s%> differing <S%G1313><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that was given <S%G1325><s%> to us, <S%G2254><s%> if prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> let us <S%G2254><s%> prophesy according to <S%G2596><s%> the proportion <S%G356><s%> of our faith; <S%G4102><s%>
or <S%G1535><s%> service, <S%G1248><s%> let us give ourselves to <S%G1722><s%> service; <S%G1248><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> he who teaches, <S%G1321><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> his teaching; <S%G1319><s%>

or <S%G1535><s%> he who exhorts, <S%G3870><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> his exhorting: <S%G3874><s%> he who gives, <S%G3330><s%> let him do it with <S%G1722><s%> liberality; <S%G572><s%> he who rules, <S%G4291><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> diligence; <S%G4710><s%> he who shows mercy, <S%G1653><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> cheerfulness. <S%G2432><s%>
Let love <S%G26><s%> be <S%G5600><s%> without hypocrisy. <S%G505><s%> Abhor <S%G655><s%> that which is evil. <S%G4190><s%> Cling <S%G2853><s%> to that which is good. <S%G18><s%>

In love <S%G5360><s%> of the brothers be tenderly affectionate <S%G5387><s%> one <S%G240><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> another; <S%G240><s%> in honor <S%G5092><s%> preferring <S%G4285><s%> one another; <S%G240><s%>
not <S%G3361><s%> lagging <S%G3636><s%> in diligence; <S%G4710><s%> fervent <S%G2204><s%> in spirit; <S%G4151><s%> serving <S%G1398><s%> the Lord; <S%G2962><s%>
rejoicing <S%G5463><s%> in hope; <S%G1680><s%> enduring <S%G5278><s%> in troubles; <S%G2347><s%> continuing steadfastly <S%G4342><s%> in prayer; <S%G4335><s%>
contributing to <S%G1377><s%> the needs <S%G5532><s%> of the saints; <S%G40><s%> given to <S%G1377><s%> hospitality. <S%G5381><s%>
Bless <S%G2127><s%> those who persecute <S%G1377><s%> you; <S%G5209><s%> bless, <S%G2127><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> curse. <S%G2672><s%>
Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> those who rejoice. <S%G5463><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Weep <S%G2799><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> those who weep. <S%G2799><s%>

Be of <S%G5426><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G5426><s%> one <S%G240><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> another. <S%G240><s%> Don't <S%G3361><s%> set your mind <S%G5426><s%> on high things, <S%G5308><s%> but <S%G235><s%> associate <S%G4879><s%> with the humble. <S%G5011><s%> Don't <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> wise <S%G5429><s%> in <S%G3844><s%> your own conceits. <S%G1438><s%>

Repay <S%G591><s%> no one <S%G3367><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> for <S%G473><s%> evil. <S%G2556><s%> Respect <S%G4306><s%> what is honorable <S%G2570><s%> in the sight of <S%G1799><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> it is possible, <S%G1415><s%> as much as it is up <S%G1537><s%> to you, <S%G5216><s%> be at peace <S%G1514><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

Don't <S%G3361><s%> seek revenge <S%G1556><s%> yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> beloved, <S%G27><s%> but <S%G235><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> to God <S%G3709><s%>'s wrath. For <S%G1063><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "Vengeance <S%G1557><s%> belongs to me; <S%G1698><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will repay, <S%G467><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>"

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> enemy <S%G2190><s%> is hungry, <S%G3983><s%> feed <S%G5595><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> he is thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> give <S%G4222><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a drink; <S%G4222><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> in doing <S%G4160><s%> so, <S%G5124><s%> you will heap <S%G4987><s%> coals <S%G440><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head. <S%G2776><s%>"
Don't <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G3528><s%> overcome <S%G3528><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> evil, <S%G2556><s%> but <S%G235><s%> overcome <S%G3528><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> good. <S%G18><s%>
